example.eg: A noted researcher came to speak at the university.
There was a noted change in Amy's behavior when she started taking her medicine.
I wrote him a note about the meeting time and left it on his desk.
example.egtrans: 我给他写了张条，告诉他会议时间，然后把条留在他书桌上。

example.eg: He didn't have a prepared text, just notes that he referred to during the speech.
example.egtrans: 他没有准备发言稿，只有一些笔记，在讲话时不时参阅。

example.eg: The flautist sounded a sweet note.
example.egtrans: 这位横笛手吹奏出甜美的乐音。

example.eg: Follow the notes on the music!  Don't just guess!
example.egtrans: 照着乐谱上的音符来！不要瞎猜！

example.eg: She noted that he was not wearing his ring.
Did you read the note at the bottom of the page?
example.egtrans: 你阅读了页面底部的注释了么？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 注释, 评注, 评注

example.eg: Professor Jones has written a brief note on the mating habits of barn owls.
example.egtrans: 琼斯教授写了一份关于仓鸮交配习性的简要说明。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 说明, 评论, 批注

example.eg: Have you got change for a twenty-pound note?
example.egtrans: 您能换开一张二十英镑的纸币吗？

example.eg: Stick to the note, and stop changing key please.
example.egtrans: 就保持这个音调，请不要变调。

dsense.name: note
dsense.guideword: (key points of a lecture, etc.) (讲课、讲座时提到的)

example.eg: The third note I would like to raise is that housing prices do fall.
example.egtrans: 我要提的第三个要点是房价确实下跌了。

example.eg: When the student misbehaved again, the teacher had a warning note in his voice.
example.egtrans: 那个学生再次违反纪律，老师的语气里暗含警告。

example.eg: This sauce has a note of walnut, don't you think?
example.egtrans: 这个酱料有胡桃的味道，你觉不觉得？

example.eg: The bird sang a beautiful note.
He did not have the money on him, so left a note.
example.egtrans: 他没带钱，所以打了个白条。

example.eg: They noted all the problems on a piece of paper.
When he noted that the house needed repair, she agreed.
